mapper.update: update product_sku set sale_num = sale_num + #{num}, stock_num = stock_num - #{num}, update_time = now() where id = #{skuId}
mapper.select: select sku.id, sku.sku_code, sku.sku_name, sku.product_id, sku.thumb_img, sku.sale_price, sku.market_price, sku.cost_price, sku.stock_num, sku.sale_num, sku.sku_spec, sku.weight, sku.volume, sku.status, sku.create_time, sku.update_time, sku.is_deleted from product_sku sku left join product p on p.id = sku.product_id where p.status = 1 and p.audit_status = 1 and sku.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 order by sku.sale_num desc limit 10
